activities:
Our SaaS application requires an individual's full name and email address for enrollment into the offering.

Sometimes you give information directly to us. For example, when you as a Bidder:

•   complete an online registration for participation in an ASAP event;
•   when you submit a service request regarding support related to our ASAP offering;
•   when you complete documents required by a Buyer for participation in an event;

We may also receive personal information as a result of Buyer activity in preparation for a 
sourcing event:

•   Contact information provided by the buying team is loaded into the application
•   Other supplier demographic information provided by the buying team for use in the sourcing 
process

Sometimes we collect information through Cookies or weblogs.  For example, we may record 
information:

•   about your operating system, browser version, IP Address, and mobile device;
•   about the web pages that you view, the information you search for or your general browser 
activity

We use information collected as described in this Statement in the following ways:

•   To facilitate the participation in as ASAP event. For example, to:
•   register for an event you have been invited to
•   create your user profile in our application
•   notify you regarding status or participation in an event(s)
•   notify you of planned upgrades our outages regarding our services
•   solicit more detailed information regarding your capabilities as a supplier
•   As otherwise required or permitted by law or with your consent.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: The personal data we require for our system is an individual's full name and email address.  We do not manually process data.
recoursemech: We have subscribed to BBB EU Safe Harbor as our dispute resolution provider.
